name: WORD R.I.P.ER
description:
Play as AZRAEL (meaning: Help From God) and help the Grim Reaper on his daily duties.

To lay rest to the poor lost souls by Reaping out the Words that keep them attached to this realm.

There is no Violence in Peace.... or Pieces XD

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD - for typing words

Left & Right Arrow Keys - for moving Character Left or Right

Mouse Left Click for UI Interaction

HAVE FUN!

-ayugu
